label: Archive formats
description: Utilized by file-roller to extract or compress different formats.

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root apt install -y unace unrar zip unzip p7zip-full p7zip-rar sharutils rar uudeview mpack arj cabextract file-roller

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root apt remove -y unace unrar zip unzip p7zip-full p7zip-rar sharutils rar uudeview mpack arj cabextract file-roller

status.command: dpkg --get-selections | grep unace unrar zip unzip p7zip-full p7zip-rar sharutils rar uudeview mpack arj cabextract file-roller
